item.description:
Hi Everyone!

What a FUN gathering the other night. Thanks to everyone for the food, the great conversation and your donations which, once again, covered the website cost for this month. Thank you, Carrie, for your home and thank you, Sue and Michelle, for the DVD and "letter" exercise. Muchas gracias one and all for coming out on a cold winter's night and making this group come alive.

The next meetup is scheduled for Monday, Feb. 15. It will be held in another member's home in Cape Elizabeth. As before, I'll send out the address a couple of days in advance to those of you who have rsvp'd. Our host will provide seltzer water. We'll do another light potluck and watch some more Abraham. The only change will be that I'll facilitate the group discussion simply in order to hopefully bring more shape and focus to the conversation.

I look forward to seeing you next month! Til then, be well.

Kate
item.name: February Meetup
